Consider risks like misinformation, timeliness, and verification challenges. (Encourages critical thinking on source reliability and ties to EVALUATE level.)

Key concepts: CTI (threat knowledge), Threat Hunting (proactive searches), OSINT subset via news. Extract IoCs (IPs, hashes), TTPs. Frameworks: STIX 2.1 (OASIS: https://oasis-open.github.io/cti-documentation/stix/intro.html), TAXII 2.1 (exchange: https://oasis-open.github.io/cti-documentation/taxii/intro.html), MITRE ATT&CK (ttps: https://attack.mitre.org/) - e.g., map SolarWinds news (C2 domains) to Tactic TA0001 Initial Access, Technique T1190. Process: Collect (RSS/Google News), Process (NLP like spaCy), Analyze (bias check), Integrate (SIEM feeds). Risks: Misinfo. Sources: MITRE ATT&CK, OASIS STIX/TAXII, SANS OSINT, Recorded Future reports. **Prerequisites:** Builds on OSINT basics. **Learning Objectives:** [Insert full list from above]. **Scaffolding Layers:** [Insert full list from above]. **Active Learning Ties:** Reference in explanations (e.g., 'Links to peer teaching on Log4Shell'). Generate flashcards per schema: [Insert full schema from above]. Ensure high-quality: factual, pedagogical progression, voter priorities (SolarWinds example, ATT&CK completion, sources). Output ONLY the JSON array of flashcards.
